greeting.title: Hi! üëãüèΩ
greeting.name: Jose S√°nchez Aranda
greeting.paragraph1: Currently, I'm working at <0>Fortris</0>, a fintech company whose main product is a crypto asset management system, where I'm part of the Frontend team!
greeting.paragraph2: Technologies like Angular, Nx, NestJS, and GraphQL are part of my daily bases. But I'm happy to say that I've worked with many frontend technologies such as React, NextJS, Loopback, Ionic, and Electron.
greeting.paragraph3: I am always keen to learn different technologies and improve as a software engineer. As an example, this web is made with <0>Astro</0>. Have you heard about <1>Astro</1> before? Have a look at the <2>source code</2> of this project.

experience.title: Experience
experience.paragraph1: I've been involved in many projects with different technologies throughout my career as a software engineer. See below my working experience.

knowmadmood.title: Frontend Lead Engineer at Knowmad Mood

fortris.title: Frontend Engineer at Fortris
fortris.description: Fortris' main product is a crypto asset management system. At Fortris I'm responsible of development, maintainability and deployment of our single page app and BFF server app.
fortris.technologies: Angular, Angular Material, Typescript, Javascript, Sass, Html, Nx, NodeJS, Express, NestJS, GraphQL, Jest, Cypress, Testing Library.

shapelets.title: Software Engineer at Shapelets
shapelets.description: Shapelets' main product is a set of tools for Data scientist. At Shapelets I was responsible of development, maintainability and deployment of a single page app which included data visualisations (Dashboards).
shapelets.technologies: React, AntDesign, Mobx, Axios, Apache Echarts, Vega visualisations, Typescript, Javascript, Less, Html, Nx, Jest, Testing Library.

sombradoble.title: Software Engineer at Sombradoble
sombradoble.description: Sombradoble is a consultancy agency specialised in scientist sector. At Sombradoble I was responsible of getting customer requirements, development, maintainability and deployment of different single page apps, progressive web apps and hybrid mobile apps.
sombradoble.technologies: Angular, Angular Material, Ionic framework, Typescript, Javascript, Sass, Html, NodeJS, Express, Loopback, MongoDB, SQLServer, Jest, Cypress.

nowait.title: CTO/Founder at Nowait
nowait.description: Founder of NoWait startup. At NoWait we developed our own product "noesperescolas.com", a platform for managing copyshops' orders in a quick and secure way.
nowait.technologies: Html, Css, Javascript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, EJS, MongoDB.

sombradoble-intern.title: Intern at Sombradoble
sombradoble-intern.description: Sombradoble is a consultancy agency specialised in scientist sector. I joined the company for building their self in-house app MyLeaf. MyLeaf allowed patients with chronic and rare diseases to monitorice their day by day and analyse the evolution they had along the time having a more knowledge about their medicaments ingest, activities they did and food they ate.
sombradoble-intern.technologies: Ionic Framework, Angular, Typescript, Javascript, Sass, Html NodeJS, Express, SQLServer, Jest, Cypress.
